Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
14.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
14.07.2008 EMB SCR12482 Changed direct SQL statement. Insert into contains field names now.
05.11.2007 SH SCR13034 Part3 Changed update of PO.INVOICENO if blank
(uses PI.PAYMENTCODE with leading zeros now)
29.10.2007 AK SCR13051 trimmed the payment code in task'PART 3 Other difference'
26.10.2006 SH SCR11942 Changed modules to fetch / update CPYC_TOTNUMBER to use
DSQL (avoid lockings)
23.09.2005 AK SCR9137 obtain CODE alternatively with language = GB
on 10.6.2005 WJ SCR8428 changhe code type
11.01.2005 SH SCR7573 Added new parameter PI.LANGUAGE, uses in part 3 to obtain
CODE; Changed parameters from SeletVirtual to SelectParameter
21.06.2004 JJ SCR6405 PO.INVOICENO always upper case
16.02.2004 SH SCR5536 Changed calc of PO.INVOICENO if GNRL_CODE='PL'
- ( 'NT' & 6 digits last unique sequence number & YY of GNRL_ACTIVEYEAR)
10.10.2003 SH SCR4394 Fixed bug, Part 3 was not executed if
- PI.PAYMENTCODE <> GNRL_PAYMCODINTEREST for 'CZ/SK/PL'
24.09.2003 RR SCR4410 Implemented new part for PL
17.09.2003 RR SCR4394 Changed content of PO.INVOICENO
10.09.2003 SH SCR4336 Changed CND for calc PO.INVOICENO if country <> CZ/SK
18.07.2002 SH INVOICENUMBER not CZ --> Filled last 7digits with leading 0
03.06.2002 SH SCR1367 Perform the special test if GNRL_CODE = "CZ" also for "SK"
BPH121 calculates new invoicenumbers for payment differences
Always return INVOICENO as upper case
-- PART 1 Interestamounts in CZ
-- Build PO.INVOICENO
-- PART 2 Interest-Differences in PL
-- Build PO.INVOICENO
-- PART 3 Other differences
-- Get v.CPYC_TOTNUMBER (using DSQL to avoid lockings and deadlocks in BPH254E)
-- Build PI.INVOICENUMBER

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CPYC_TOTNUMBER FROM :1/CPYC WHERE CPYC_ADMNO = :2 and CPYC_CLNTNO = :3 and CPYC_CODE = :4 OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS WITH NC

Text.val: -- In case of an already existing CPYC row, CPYC_TOTNUMBER has to be increased
with 1
... else a new row has to be added with CPYC_TOTNUMBER = 1

SQL_STMT_U.val: UPDATE :1/CPYC SET CPYC_TOTNUMBER = :2 WHERE CPYC_ADMNO = :3 and CPYC_CLNTNO = :4 and CPYC_CODE = :5 WITH NC
INSERT INTO :1/CPYC ( CPYC_ADMNO, CPYC_CLNTNO, CPYC_CODE, CPYC_TOTNUMBER) VALUES(:2, :3, :4, 1) WITH NC
